meta.note: Props suggestions for Sunday afternoon slate based on official Week 13 schedule.

qbs.name: Matthew Stafford
qbs.matchup_note: Facing a struggling Raiders defense in a game with shootout potential.
qbs.why: Chargers-Raiders was listed among the more pass-heavy matchups for Week 13 previews.

sources.name: Chargers vs Raiders Week 13 preview – Chargers.com

qbs.name: Jordan Love
qbs.matchup_note: On the road at a tough Seattle defense — likely a balanced game script.
qbs.why: Vikings-Seahawks projects as a moderately competitive game; Love's upside is limited by Seattle's defense per matchup previews.

sources.name: NFL Week 13 game preview – Seattle vs Minnesota – Yahoo Sports

rbs.name: Austin Ekeler
rbs.matchup_note: Workhorse back with pass-catching upside against a Raiders front that has struggled to stop the run.
rbs.why: Chargers-Raiders preview notes his dual-threat role as a key advantage in this matchup.

sources.name: Chargers final thoughts before Week 13 – Chargers.com

rbs.name: Cam Akers
rbs.matchup_note: Lead back in a likely balanced attack vs. a Vikings defense vulnerable to the run.
rbs.why: Vikings-Seahawks projections list this as a spot where run-volume could matter given weather and defensive strengths.

sources.name: Seattle vs Minnesota Week 13 preview – BleedingGreenNation

wrs.name: Keenan Allen
wrs.matchup_note: Primary receiving option for Stafford in a likely shootout vs. Raiders.
wrs.why: Chargers-Raiders previews highlight Allen as top target with favorable matchup vs. a weaker secondary.

sources.name: Chargers vs Raiders props and bets preview – Fox Sports NFL

wrs.name: Jordan Addison
wrs.matchup_note: Slot WR likely to see volume, especially if Seattle stays ahead and leans passing.
wrs.why: In a game where Seahawks may force Minnesota to pass if they're trailing, Addison is the Vikings' most reliable receiving option according to previews.

sources.name: Vikings vs Seahawks Week 13 preview – Sports blog
